results.abstract: Bates was on a magazine cover at 15. He was playing Division I college basketball at 17. Now he’s 19, his college career may be over, and N.B.A. success is anything but guaranteed.
results.des_facet: ['Colleges and Universities', 'Draft and Recruitment (Sports)', 'Basketball', 'Basketball (College)', 'Athletics and Sports', 'Content Type: Personal Profile']

multimedia.caption: Emoni Bates played one season at Eastern Michigan, in his hometown, Ypsilanti, but is expected to enter the upcoming N.B.A. draft.
multimedia.copyright: Jeff Blake/USA Today Sports, via Reuters

results.org_facet: ['Eastern Michigan University', 'Mid-American Conference', 'National Basketball Assn', 'National Collegiate Athletic Assn', 'Sports Illustrated', 'University of Memphis']
results.title: He Was Billed as the Next LeBron. But Will Emoni Bates Make It at All?
